alert.note: Alert for Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Coffee, northwestern Bacon and south central Jeff Davis Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 330 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of West Green, or 11 miles southwest of Graham, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Coffee, northwestern Bacon and south central Jeff Davis Counties, which includes Denton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
